title: Land for Sale in Near Kalutara Police Training School -160 Perches
details:
4 km from Kalutara temple (from Galle Road) Close to Kalutara Police Training School.
Only 6Km to Dodangoda highway exit.
20 feet wide road.. Telephone, Tap water & Electricity
Partially built building.
8 feet high parapet wall

160 Perches (1Acre) rectangular shaped land situated just 4 km from Kalutara temple (from Galle Road) in close proximity to Kalutara Police Training School. Only 6Km to Matara - Colombo expressway entry at Dodangoda. Accessed by 423/2 Bus route. 20 feet wide roads. Telephone, Water & Electricity facilities. Partially built building which can be completed to be used as a Holiday home/ Reception hall/ Factory or a Hotel. 8 feet high parapet wall along two sides of the land with 15 feet wide gate and wire mesh fence boundaries for other two sides. If needed, the land can be divided easily to small plots and sell separately.
Over 30 years clear deeds accepted by banks. without considering the value of constructions worth 3 million. just Rs.110,000/= per perch.
